title: Bellhop Bell

nouns: Someone employed as an errand boy and luggage carrier around hotels
A male worker, usually at a hotel, who carries luggage and runs errands.
A bellhop, also bellboy is a hotel porter, who helps patrons with their luggage while checking in or out.
Someone employed as an errand boy and luggage carrier around hotels.
A percussive instrument made of metal or other hard material, typically but not always in the shape of an inverted cup with a flared rim, which resonates when struck.
A hollow device made of metal that makes a ringing sound when struck
An object made of metal or other hard material, typically but not always in the shape of an inverted cup with a flared rim, which resonates when struck.
A signal used for transitions during a school day
The flared end of a brass or woodwind instrument.

A bell is a signal in a school that tells the students when it is time to go to class in the morning and when it is time to change classes during the day as well as when students are dismissed from school.
Sound making device designed to communicate with students

description:
Ding! A call bell, as pressed at a front desk or reception to alert staff for service, such as from a concierge or bellhop (porter) to carry luggage at a hotel. Generally depicted as a golden bell on a wooden stand.

Commonly represents alerts or notifications to bring attention to important content. May also be used of various content concerning the hospitality and service industries.

Microsoft’s design previously featured a silver bell radiating yellow rays, as if ringing.
apple_vendor_description: The bellhop bell emoji on Apple devices is a polished, classic instrument rendered with a bright, reflective brass finish and a satisfyingly rounded top. Apple's meticulous attention to detail brings out the subtle gleam and dimensionality, making it appear almost tangible. This iconic symbol, as depicted on Apple devices, is commonly used to summon service, request assistance, or signal the need for attention in a polite and distinguished manner.
